title: Gab and Juls: Is Antony Worth the Risk for United?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Manchester United's €100m approach for Ajax's Antony and ask whether the deal is a risk for Erik Ten Hag's side. The guys also discuss Liverpool's 9-0 victory over Bournemouth, Barcelona's comfortable win over Valladolid, Benzema's continued brilliance for Real Madrid and Paul Pogba's public family feud.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Antony and Ronaldo's futures a Man United; Liverpool drop 9 goals on Bournemouth; Barcelona back to their best?
